name: Chuango
0:
”Alexa, ask Chuango to arm away”
”Alexa, ask Chuango to arm stay”
”Alexa, ask Chuango to record video”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chuan go
des:
With the Chuango skill, you are able to control your alarm system and camera using your voice.
With the skill you can:
“Alexa, ask Chuango to arm away”
“Alexa, ask Chuango to arm stay”
“Alexa, ask Chuango to record video”
“Alexa, ask Chuango to turn on Privacy Mode”
 and more to come...
Notice:
For security consideration, we don’t offer Disarming function (for alarm) and Turning Off Privacy Mode (for camera) for the voice control.

Arming in Home Mode
“Alexa, ask Chuango to arm in home mode”
“Alexa, ask Chuango to home mode”

Notice:
For security consideration, we don’t offer Disarming function for the voice control.
